entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (nova_rank3.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_100: Thank you, it is a pleasure.
entries.s_102: We have been tasked with making Orion's life miserable. Can you handle that?
entries.s_106: Good. Our first order of business is to rescue one of our freighters that was attacked by 'pirates'.
entries.s_108: You think it is a trap?
entries.s_110: I know it is. Let's teach them Orions a lesson.
entries.s_20: Nice work on getting that convoy in.
entries.s_26: Why are you here? You should be with the convoy.
entries.s_32: Wow, great work! They wont be using those hyperspace lanes anytime soon.
entries.s_38: Thanks, it did get a little hairy out there.
entries.s_39: Nothing you couldn't handle, I'm sure.
entries.s_41: We are attempting to get resupplied without Orion stopping us.
entries.s_42: So we need to get a convoy in here?
entries.s_49: I think so too. It looks like their number one pilot is out to get you, as well.
entries.s_50: Not if I get them first.
entries.s_51: My thoughts exactly. You should head out to the area they were last seen.
entries.s_57: While you were out there Orion staged an attack and took out one of our top pilots.
entries.s_58: So I was just a distraction?
entries.s_59: No, I think they meant to take you both out. This means war.
entries.s_61: Yes, we can't let them get away with this. You need to get a promotion so we can use you on the front lines. Jonas Nova will be calling shots at that level.
entries.s_62: Exactly! We need you to make sure they get here as safe as possible.
entries.s_64: You are supposed to be disrupting those shipping lanes.
entries.s_66: I know, I am heading out now.
entries.s_7: Get your promotion taken care of. We need you out there. Willard can take care of it for you.
entries.s_76: The Orions didn't know what hit them.
entries.s_78: I bet they didn't. You ready for your next assignment?
entries.s_8: Congratulations. Although there is some bad news too.
entries.s_82: This next one will be fun. We have uncovered some shipping routes that Orion thinks he can use.
entries.s_84: You want me to go there and cause trouble?
entries.s_86: Exactly, get out there and teach them that hyperspace is not safe.
entries.s_88: What are you doing here? Shouldn't you be out there springing that trap?
entries.s_96: Here they are, now get out there.
entries.s_98: Welcome to the new Nova Industries.
